price: (64) Indeed, Allāh has cursed the disbelievers and prepared for them a Blaze.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَعَنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ سَعِيرًا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha laʿana al-kāfirīna wa-aʿadda lahum saʿīran
